name: Mantis

abilities.name: Weak Point Strike
abilities.details: Precise martial arts strikes that may briefly increase damage taken by the enemy.

abilities.name: Empathic Heal
abilities.details: Soothes an ally's mind, providing healing over time.

abilities.name: Sleep Spores
abilities.details: Releases spores in front of her, putting affected enemies to sleep for ~3 seconds (damage wakes).

ultimate.name: Life Force Transfer
ultimate.effect: Massively heals allies (~250 health?) and grants them a temporary damage buff (~15%?) for 5 seconds.
ultimate.details: Unleashes a powerful wave of empathic, life-giving energy.

passives.name: Empathy
passives.details: Can sense nearby enemies through walls when they use abilities or take damage (brief pulse).

passives.name: Precognition
passives.details: Slightly increased dodge chance or brief warning before major attacks hit?

teamups.effect: Empathic Heal provides a slightly stronger heal-over-time effect to specified allies.

lore: An empath with precognitive abilities and advanced martial arts skills. Raised by the Kree Priests of Pama, Mantis has connections to the Cotati and has been destined to become the Celestial Madonna.
